Create a soap dispenser that dispenses soap in the shape of a hand, with the soap coming out of the fingers.
Design a soap dispenser that doubles as a hand sanitizer dispenser, with a button to switch between the two.
Create a soap dispenser that dispenses soap in the shape of a flower, with the petals opening to release the soap.

Create a soap dispenser that dispenses soap in the shape of a animal, with the animal's mouth open to release the soap.
